• VXLIB Function Reference
Min, Max Location

OpenVX Function Description

  • Finds the minimum and maximum values in an image and a location for each.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/d8/d05/group__group__vision__function__minmaxloc.html

VXLIB APIs

  • VXLIB_minMaxLoc_i8u : Input image is U8 format
  • VXLIB_minMaxLoc_i16s : Input image is S16 format
